subject: URGENT REPLY
body:
Hello Madam

This is to inform you that we have been working towards the eradication of
fraudulent business transactions with the help of the Organization of
African Unity (OAU), the International Monetary Fund (IMF), and the FBI. We
have been able to track down so many of these business compromise
transactions in various parts of African countries, USA, and Europe, and
they are all on our watch list and will appear at the International
Criminal Court (ICC) Hague (Netherlands) soon for Criminal/Fraud Justice.
During the course of our investigation, we discovered unclaimed funds, The
Anti-Crime Commission wing of the (FIC) has ordered that the money
recovered to be re-profile for compensation applications. Therefore this
Email/Letter is directed to you because your email address was found in our
database investigation file; maybe you have been scammed or have received
solicited messages.

You are therefore being compensated with the sum of USD1,500,000.00.
Payment arrangements have been made through an activated ATM Merchant Card
which will be issued in your name and delivered to your postal address in
other to access your compensation fund.

To issue the ATM Merchant Card, you are therefore advised to contact the
recovery department, this is because the OAU Anti-Crime Commission, the
International Monetary Fund (IMF), and the Financial Intelligence Center
have mandated a payout of all the compensation funds through the global
payments technology that enables consumers, businesses, financial
institutions, and governments to use digital currency instead of cash and
checks. Kindly contact the ATM Merchant and recovery office for your
compensation payment with the below contact details:

Name:      Elder Benchman Turner
Contact:   [benchmanturner@gmail.com]

(Recoveries of your past lost)


Establish contact with the above details and provide further information
below to process your payout amount:

1. Your Full Name:
2. Nationality:
3. Your Age:
4. Occupation:
5. Contact Number:
